name: Creator Mario
author: Llennpie
description:
An expanded, fully customizable Mario model.

Features:
- Customize anything - eyes, mustache, cap emblem, sideburns & buttons
- Fully cc-able; Sideburns take the color of the hair, and the cap M takes the color of the cap
- Optional mouth expression for even more expressiveness
- Copyright-free textures for easy distribution
